question: Which statutory organization recently observed its 57th foundation year on 14th Jan 2021?
option2: National Bank for Agriculture and Rural Development
explanation:
The Food Corporation of India (FCI) is an organization run by the Government of India and was formed on 14 January 1965.
It is a statutory body under the Ministry of Consumer Affairs, Food and Public Distribution formed by the Food Corporation Act 1964. The FCI is headquartered at New Delhi.
